extendedInfo.description: The #1 AD-FREE Premium English dictionary app for Android since 2010âwith over 2,000,000 definitions and synonyms from Dictionary.com & Thesaurus.com! Enjoy exclusive Premium features, like example sentences, no ads and more! â Time Magazine âTop 10 Back-To-School App â Winner: CNET Top 100 Mobile App Award ââ Winner: Best App Ever for Books & ReferenceFeatures:* English Dictionary and Thesaurusâover 2,000,000 definitions, synonyms & antonyms* Browse without distracting advertisements* Example sentences* Daily contentâincluding Word of the Day, the Hot WordÂ & Slideshows* Audio pronunciationsÂ * Idioms & phrases* Word origin & history* Voice search * Favorite wordsÂ * Search history* Spelling suggestions* IPA and phonetic pronunciations* Commonly looked-up words mapped to specific locations* Medical, legal & financial content* Abbreviations, acronyms & slang content * Word of the Day home screen widget * Compatible with tablet devices like the Nexus 7 & Samsung Galaxy TabâHighlighted Reviews in Google Play â âI downloaded the free version initially, but later elected to download the pay version of the app because there is no advertising. It is one of the most widely used apps on my phone and all the information I need is at my fingertips. I feel this should be an app that comes automatically on the phone.â âA Google UserâThis app is amazing! I use it everyday! I love all the features! The thesaurus, that it will pronounce words for you, the favorites, everything! Best Dictionary app out there with the most features!â âA Google User âSuch a great app! Way easier than opening your browser every time you need to look up a word, quick thesaurus toggle, and interesting "Word of the Day", "Trending Searches", and even more!â â Michelle M. âI use this little jewel everyday at work and in my work car. It has been a blessing to me when I need to write reports or express myself. I have this app on my phone and it is so easy to use. I give it ten stars. It a must on every mobile electronic device.â âA Google UserâI find this app very useful and a great resource. Having the thesaurus feature is an added bonus as I write a lot of papers. The synonym feature is great way to expand your vocabulary. The whole family enjoys it!â â Jacquita E .âThis app has made life in my law class so much easier. I'm able to understand the legal definitions provided. Much needed.â- Stanley O.

reviews.title: Just one problem
reviews.comment: Paid to get premium and now the widget is displayed as 4x2 size on my home screen of my Motorola Droid RAZR even tho it should only be 4x1. App works great tho and still recommend it but the free version was displayed properly as opposed to the paid.
reviews.author: Steven Valle

reviews.title: Much improved
reviews.comment: Recent updates to this app have really improved it. The search bar is intuitive now, easier to navigate, etc. Thank you for these great changes!
reviews.author: Abigail Rockwell

reviews.title: Five Banger
reviews.comment: How many times do I have to rate this thing?? Love it, but will be deducting a star each time I\'m asked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best on the market .
reviews.comment: I practically live by this  everyday . Its been an excellent learning application and vocabulary development. You just keep making it better, and I love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Concise, Commendable!
reviews.comment: I am constantly using this app for my daily dealings as well as my writing. It never disappoints.
reviews.author: Andrew Strommen

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: I use the home screen Widget. I love getting a new word to learn each day! Mostly though I use the app as a bedside dictionary for reading. It\'s handy, simple, and rarely does it not have the word I need. Great app!
reviews.author: Jaymie Kehr

reviews.title: Free version was better
reviews.comment: I upgraded to Pro and wish I hadn\'t!  Can\'t find my M-points, the hot words don\'t update as regularly. ... reinstalling the free one smh.
reviews.author: Carla H

reviews.comment: Much better now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updated from excellent to good
reviews.comment: Before updating, this application had every feature a serious wordsmith needed or even desired. The redundant features added have reduced its utility as a dictionary.
reviews.author: Ali Mohyee

reviews.title: The best app to learn new words.
reviews.comment: It\'s great, try it. You won\'t regret it.
reviews.author: Carlos Sanchez

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I use this app nearly every day. I really like the additional  information provided, and the ability to hear how a word is pronouncrd. I learn alot. Worth it to pay for the upgrade and not have any adds.
reviews.author: Christina Darnell

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love this app because it\'s so easy & accessible....5 stars
reviews.author: terell Johnson

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This just is the best app. No 5 stars cos I wish I could use it offline. Other than that the redesign and improvements are great.
reviews.author: Joseph Izang

reviews.title: A worthy ap
reviews.comment: What\'s not to love? It\'s fast, mobile and makes understanding easy.  I used to use the OED but now I just go to my phone!
reviews.author: Cat Knight

reviews.title: 10 Stars!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing! I use it everyday! I love all the features! The thesaurus, that it will pronounce words for you, the favorites, everything! Best Dictionary app out there with the most features! Plus, I\'ve never once had a problem with it! HTC ONE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth the $ ! Great app !
reviews.comment: Clear display and easy to use ! Excellent voice to text feature. the best I have ever seen in an app, always get the word correct on the first try. I would highly recommend this app !
reviews.author: Donna Hanna

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Solid, well made up. Don\'t constantly beg for a rating. No means no.
reviews.author: Scott Pimental

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: I love the ability to hear the word. The additional ability to have a word a day, follow words that are trending, and other \"extras\" with this app make learning fun. Who thought a dictionary could be fun?
reviews.author: Faith Smith

reviews.title: Just went premium
reviews.comment: I love the app, love daily \"Hot Word\" and all the slideshows. Not sure how to get my mpoints to switch over from the free app. Other than that it\'s great.
reviews.author: Aaron Greene

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Ishould be able to have words I search for sounded out so I\'m certain I am pronouncing them correctly ...only reason for three instead of five stars.
reviews.author: Jay Solberg
